findings.title: Inconsistent vesting period in Reserve pool
findings.description: The `Reserve` pool vesting period is inconsistent between specification and implementation, with 2 years specified but intermediate partial releases of tokens every 183 days implemented.

findings.title: Inconsistent release logic for Advisors/Partners pool
findings.description: The release logic for Advisors/Partners pool in Migration.sol contradicts the specification, releasing 20% every 3 months with an immediate first release instead of 25% every 3 months starting from the date of first Token Distribution.
